title: # 346 - Jeremiah Watkins & ME
description:
Today I sit down in the mancave and try to find the innocence of comedian Jeremiah Watkins. We talk about growing up in Kansas, family dysfunction, virginity, the 15 years in the future game, and much more!
You can catch Jeremiah on the Kill Tony Podcast and his podcast "Jeremiah Wonders". His new Comedy album "Regan & Watkins" is out June 7th on iTunes!

This episode is brought to you by Omaha Steaks. Enter code “Bertcast” in the search bar and get 74% off the fathers day steak fix package at www.omahasteaks.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Harry's. For quality shaving and grooming products at a fair price go to www.harrys.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Shipstation. Try free for 60 days by going to www.shipstation.com. Just click on the microphone at the top of the page and use the promo code “Bert”

This episode is also brought to you by Free Fly. Get 20% off when you visit www.freeflyapparel.com and use promo code “Bertcast”

This episode is also brought to you by Comedy Central’s “Your Two Dads with Sean & Julian” Subscribe to their podcast wherever you get your podcasts

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on pre sale now! Use the promo code “Shots” to get tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
